triples.name: K-means clustering
triples.relevance: The paper addresses how to choose the parameter k in k-means clustering, which is the core problem motivating the work.

triples.name: Elbow method (clustering)
triples.relevance: The paper critically examines the elbow method heuristic and advocates for its replacement with better alternatives.

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: Cluster analysis is the broader field and problem domain within which k-means clustering and the elbow method are applied.
